description: This lamb and lentil shepherd's pie is just as delicious as the original with extra goodness and heartiness from lentils.
name: Lighter Lamb & Lentil Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mince into an ovenproof dish, smooth mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
